metadata.name: A Study of Grant Riven Yun’s Cow
metadata.description:
Grant Riven Yun’s Cow artwork is more than recognizable, it’s iconic. The purpose of this study is to show how minimal brushstrokes and colors can be used to recreate the iconic piece, Cow.

Study created in Adobe Fresco using only 12 brushstrokes and 4 colors. Background using 1 additional color and minimal downstrokes.
